_header: O mortal man and worms meat
_description: Warning to sinners to repent — one quatrain

CamStJohn195.Transcription:
O Mortall man & wormes meatRemember that death must be thy
                    enddeferr not therfore nor yet forgetthi most sinfull lyfe in tyme to
                    amende
CamStJohn195.Note: Added to lower margin by a sixteenth-century hand.
